search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Thrive Themes (thrive-themes.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Thrive Themes is: [https://thrivethemes.com/pricing/](https://thrivethemes.com/pricing/) .

extracted_content.content:
Build it. Launch it. Sell it.
-----------------------------

Join **22,000+ Entrepreneurs** Who Are Building Their Online Business With Thrive Suite

### Thrive Suite Yearly

Build a WordPress site that converts.

--------

------------

###### **Thrive Suite Includes:**

*   **All 8 Thrive Themes WordPress Plugins:** _Thrive Architect, Thrive Quiz Builder, Thrive Leads, Thrive Apprentice, Thrive Ultimatum, Thrive Ovation, Thrive Optimize, Thrive Comments_
*   **Thrive Theme Builder** with a growing library of plug-and-play companion themes and designer-made templates 
*   **24/5** Support
*   Access to **Thrive University**
*   Install and use on **up to 5 websites**
*   **30 Day** Money Back Guarantee

\*All pricing is in USD. All renewals are at full price. You can change plans or cancel your account at any time.

Looking for our **Agency License**? [Get it here](https://checkout.thrivethemes.com/thrive-suite-agency-yearly/?coupon=AGENCY).

![Image 2](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:25/h:25/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/Money-badge.webp)

![Image 5](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:83/h:15/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/wpbeginner_text.webp)

![Image 6](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:26/h:26/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/03/blue-checkmark.webp)

![Image 7](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:175/h:137/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/tcb_content_templates/testimonial/images/Quotation_marks_image_white-opaque.png)

#### Rohit Singla

Learn with Rohit

### "I have been using Thrive Suite for more than a year now and my experience with **it has just been phenomenal.**  
I don't see any other tool offering these kinds of features at this time."

Thrive has definitely taken my business to the next level. I got started with Thrive Themes on a recommendation from one of my great friends and mentor. After that, I launched my own Program BYOW (Build Your Own Website)

Now I am training doctors and business owners across India on how they can Build Their Own Websites using Thrive Suite.

Thrive has been one of the game changing things that happened in my life. I'm so happy & grateful that I invested in Thrive Themes for my business.

![Image 8](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:50/h:50/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Thrive-Customer-Highlights-Square-Dave-Sollis.jpg)

Dave Sollis// Coach

I love the Thrive Theme Builder style editor. Being able to set site-wide color schemes and fonts is fantastic.

So are the ready-made templates. They make it so easy to get a decent looking page built really quickly. I couldn’t believe how fast I was able to create my homepage – complete with blog post grid and newsletter sign-ups.

Thrive Apprentice is also great and has been a real lifesaver for me too. \[My course\] is now completely in my control. I’m no longer at the mercy of a course platform.

![Image 9](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:50/h:50/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/02/Thrive-Customer-Highlights-Square-Idan-Kirshner.jpg)

Idan Kirchner  // Yoga teacher

Thrive has helped me turn my passion for yoga into a real, online business I was able to build my dream life around.

Their tools are fast, reliable, and always improving.

![Image 10](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:50/h:50/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Thrive-Customer-Highlights-Square-Daniel-David-Wallace.jpg)

Daniel David Wallace// Coach

I have a course business, a coaching business, and more recently I run events for my audience.

I think people should use Thrive Theme Builder and Apprentice to build a really great website, and then use tools like Thrive Leads and other lead-building tools within Thrive Suite to really focus on building up an email list.

I can't wait to see more Thrive Themes features in the future.

![Image 11](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:50/h:50/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Thrive-Customer-Highlights-Square-Claire-Gervais.jpg)

Claire Gervais// Coach

Thrive Themes was the best investment I made for my business.

I can literally do everything I want, from adding a punky design all over my site with the woosh of a click, to zooming in on my potential customers thanks to cool opt-ins and popups.

Without it, I think working on my website would be as hard and frustrating as a day without a good ol' cup of dark coffee 70% Arabica 30% Robusta (Kenyan is the best).

![Image 12](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:50/h:50/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Thrive-Customer-Highlights-Square-Viola-Eva.jpg)

Viola Eva // SEO Agency

I am a digital marketer and SEO, this means that I work with websites day in and day out. However, I am neither a web designer nor web developer - but I want a good-looking site that is easy to update.

I look at so many WordPress websites for my clients and a lot of them have a clunky backend, or they need design and development resources to make updates. This is why I love using Thrive Suite on my website - everything is in my control.

The builders are easy to use and, if I ever have a question, the Thrive team has surely covered it with a video.

And best of all - my complete lack of design skills is compensated by the templated building Blocks. WordPress is often a mess of plugins that don’t talk to each other or cause problems when updating, not so with Thrive Themes where everything runs smoothly. I can not recommend them enough!

#### Read more stories from real Thrive Suite customers [here.](https://thrivethemes.com/thrive-suite-customers/)

**FAQ**
-------

Here are answers to some common questions about the Thrive Suite.

#### What's included in Thrive Suite?

Thrive Suite includes

\- All our plugins: Thrive Architect, Thrive Leads, Thrive Quiz Builder, Thrive Apprentice, Thrive Comments, Thrive Ovation, Thrive Optimize & Thrive Ultimatum

\- Thrive Theme Builder and the companion themes Shapeshift, Ommi and Kwik

\- Unlimited support as long as your Thrive Suite license is in good standing

\- Unlimited updates as long as your Thrive Suite license is in good standing

\- Full access to premium templates

#### Can I use this to build my blog?

Thrive Suite is perfect if you're starting a blog. You can build your site and blog using Thrive Theme Builder, create blog posts using Thrive Architect and add opt-in forms using Thrive Leads.

Thrive Suite includes all the tools you need to have a blog that will first engage your audience and then get them on your mailing list so they'll keep coming back for more.

#### Is Thrive Suite a subscription?

Yes, Thrive Suite is purchased on a quarterly or yearly subscription basis.

#### Do you offer refunds?

Yes, if for any reason you're not happy with Thrive Suite, you can get a swift refund within 30 days of purchase by contacting our support team.

#### Will I get access to new plugins and themes?

Yes, as long as you have an active Thrive Suite license, you'll automatically get access to any and all new tools we release!

#### Do you have tutorials?

We have hundreds of tutorials for every single feature and element in our toolkit and we provide full step-by-step videos on how to set everything up.

#### Does this work with WordPress.com blogs?

No, unfortunately not. You'll need a self-hosted WordPress.org website to use Thrive Suite.

#### Is Thrive Theme Builder part of Thrive Suite?

Yes it is!

#### What happens if I don't renew my Thrive Suite license?

Your existing website, opt-in forms, landing pages, quizzes, etc. will stay intact and working. The only difference is that getting support, updates and using our premium templates requires an active license.

#### What can I expect in terms of new features and templates?

We're constantly adding new features and templates to our toolkit! Last year we added 118 new features, one completely new tool and tons of premium templates. As a Thrive Suite customer you get access to it all!

#### I have another question...

![Image 13](https://mlpxhq8ztvyc.i.optimole.com/cb:p0Z2.44bbf/w:105/h:130/q:mauto/f:best/https://thrivethemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/thrive_suite_overview_badge.png)

Our **100% Satisfaction** Guarantee
-----------------------------------

If, for any reason, you don't like Thrive Suite, you can **get a full refund anytime within 30 days** after your first purchase. If you have any issues, just get in touch with our friendly support team and they'll either help you out until you get the results you need or give you a swift refund.

[Ready? Get Started With Thrive Suite Today!](https://thrivethemes.com/pricing/#tve-jump-180d8d24b14)
